attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Support the application to Leicester City Council that a statue of Mahatma Gandhi be erected in Leicester. The statue would celebrate the life and work of Gandhi as the leadfing figure of non-violent resistance and as a champion of inter-cultural harmony and cooperation"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17878


Prime Minister's Office
